JobFullDesc:
In this role you will be responsible for managing the execution and analytics of etail media programs for a designated client. You will also be responsible for the recommendation, set up and bid strategy for the digital retail plan. You will work closely with client Strategy and Activation teams across Digital, Search, Social and Addressable channels to allow for holistic digital retail media function.

Job Responsibilities

Key Responsibilities:


Activates, Optimizes and measures digital retail media programs as are consistent with brand marketing objectives 
Helps to manage Search and Display campaigns through a managed service with approved retail partners
Ensures tactical consistency across all elements of plan development and implementation 
Measures media performance and manages pacing at all stages to ensure original objectives and strategies are being met to client satisfaction 
Helps to oversee relationship with media partners for these specific programs 
Oversees both media & sales metrics evaluation and optimization recommendations 
Ensures knowledge sharing across internal teams, open communication & provides thought leadership 
Identifies & builds functional expertise or knowledge in a relevant, unique & specific media area, including shopper media expertise 
Seeks out information to remain current on media trends
Works in Platforms for Search and Display activations

Desired Skills & Experience

Desired Skills & Experience:


Agency and/or addressable media or Search Campaign Management/Delivery experience preferred 
Proven knowledge of digital media activations 
Experience with marketing and communications process required 
Proven experience in writing and presenting relevant information to client audience 
Excellent written and verbal communication skills and proven problem-solving ability 
Can carry conversations with clients easily 
Self- sufficient and problem solver 
Management of team
